## AuthPlus.getClient() method

Override getClient(), memoizing an instance of auth for subsequent calls to getProjectId().

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getClient(options?: GoogleAuthOptions): Promise<Compute | JWT | UserRefreshClient>;
```
